issue.title: Clarification on skip checkpoints and scoring

content.raw:
* After `1 1`, there is no need to call the start service again unless you want to skip or restart a checkpoint. Tasks automatically start as you leave finish boxes.

* I know the documentation is confusing, but please note the sentence which says:

    _The last column of the table describes what happens when you **skip past** a checkpoint. Note that this is different from **skipping to** that checkpoint._

* Just added a [mention](#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/commits/946ccb2832e31e1ac578e2e780e1a35db8ec0797) to the cumulative score reset to the wiki, you're correct, the streak is reset.
content.html:
• After 1 1, there is no need to call the start service again unless you want to skip or restart a checkpoint. Tasks automatically start as you leave finish boxes.

  • I know the documentation is confusing, but please note the sentence which says:

    The last column of the table describes what happens when you skip past a checkpoint. Note that this is different from skipping to that checkpoint.

  • Just added a mention to the cumulative score reset to the wiki, you're correct, the streak is reset.
